guidetextbox.jcr:title: Hidden: Email address to submit to
guidetextbox.name: emailToSubmit

guidetextdraw._value:
Page 1 of 8

This online service is for Yukon residents to update information on their Yukon Health Care Insurance Plan.

Application fee: There is no cost to apply for this service.

Before you start

You need:

  • a valid Yukon Health Care Insurance Plan number; and
  • documentation to support your requested change. You’ll be asked to upload this with your application if you update the following. 
    • Given name
      • 1 copy of your primary ID (birth certificate, passport, citizenship card or Permanent Resident status card) and
      • name change document.
    • Last name (legal name change)
      • 1 copy of your primary ID (birth certificate, passport, citizenship card or Permanent Resident status card) and 
      • name change document.
    • Last name (marriage) 
      • 1 copy of your primary ID (birth certificate, passport, citizenship card or Permanent Resident status card) and 
      • marriage licence.
    • Last name (divorce) 
      • 1 copy of your primary ID (birth certificate, passport, citizenship card or Permanent Resident status card). 
    • First Nation status number
      • 1 copy of your First Nation status card. 

Information for document uploads

File formats accepted: .png, .jpeg, .pdf or .doc.
Maximum file size: 56 MB

More information about the service

You can find more details, instructions, and other ways to access this service on Yukon.ca.
guidetextdraw.name: startText

guidetextdraw_1695985121._value:
A note about privacy 

Information contained in this form is collected, used, and disclosed in accordance with Yukon’s Health Information Privacy and Management Act and other applicable laws. A written statement of Health and Social Services information practices can be viewed at www.yukon.ca/healthprivacy or by contacting the department’s Privacy Officer at healthprivacy@yukon.ca.
guidetextdraw_1695985121.name: privacyText
